title: Biden Knew, And He Did It Anyway (Ep 1720)
description:
Biden knew about the Russian response, and he’s playing dumb. In this episode I address the video evidence that we’ve all been lied to. 

News Picks:

Be very careful. The financial weapons being used against Russia could be turned on you.

Why isn’t the Biden administration revealing the details about the assassination plot against John Bolton? 

Is the world’s food supply at risk?


Florida makes a move on vaccines which will have liberals melting down.

Another “woke” television series gets the cold shoulder from audiences.
